_aChangeLog.text: Remade the materia-collection system, it should not glitch anymore
Added a bonus as suggested by Frosties where you have to collect all 6 materias
Implemented more directional triggers for first timers
Added a missing teleport along with some other minor fixes

_sText:
**This is a modified version of ze_FFVII_Mako_Reactor_v5_3 by Hannibal[SPA] with help from Kaemon. I did not make this. I simply re-worked it to function as a bhop/course map, with permission.**

A true classic in the zombie mod realm. I like the map, and I like jumping around on it, so I made this. Bunnyhopping isn't required to complete the objectives. Intended for servers with timers, which is also how I justified the bhop_ prefix. Please note that the timer zones **has to be where specified in order to prevent any glitching.
**

This map uses a new non-linear completion system. [Click here for the prefab.](http://css.gamebanana.com/prefabs/6845 "")
